project1.title: Shotz!
project1.description: For this project, we created a program to keep track of shooting locations for movies. A search element is provided to search for locations and buttons are provided to filter by shoot time. Click on the movie card to see all locations associated with that movie.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, jQuery, Boostrap 4

project2.title: Sandwich Maker
project2.description: This project is a simple sandwich maker providing ingredient cards and a final product card with the total amount due.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, Bootstrap 4

project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github
